data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Hưng Yên to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hưng Yên, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Hưng Yên, Vietnam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,096,069 lost in Hưng Yên that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Hưng Yên, Vietnam.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Indonesian people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Hưng Yên.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Hưng Yên access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hưng Yên, Vietnam has a population of 1,120,300.

We estimate Hưng Yên has 24,231 people who might know Jesus, 89,862 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,006,207 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Hưng Yên unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
